editors.description: adds an editor for modifying the local project, initiating a Rug archive if needed
editors.name: AddLocalEditor

parameters.name: editorName
parameters.description: name for the new Rug editor
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Rug name starting with a capital letter and containing only alphanumeric characters, from one to 100 characters long

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: description of the new Rug editor
parameters.default_value: an editor for modifying this project
parameters.valid_input_description: free text

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Maven group identifier, often used to provide a namespace for your rugs, e.g., company-rugs, typically the GitHub owner
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Maven group ID, which starts with a letter, -, or _ and contains only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters and may having leading period separated identifiers starting with letters or underscores and containing only alphanumeric and _ characters

parameters.name: archiveName
parameters.description: name of your new Rug Archive, typically the same as the repo name
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid GitHub repo name containing only alphanumeric, ., -, and _ characters

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Maven group identifier, often used to provide a namespace for your rugs, e.g., company-rugs, typically the GitHub owner
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Maven group ID, which starts with a letter, -, or _ and contains only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters and may having leading period separated identifiers starting with letters or underscores and containing only alphanumeric and _ characters

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: initial version of the project, e.g., 1.2.3
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid semantic version, http://semver.org

editors.description: adds TypeScript supporting files to a Rug archive project
editors.name: AddTypeScript

editors.description: adds a TypeScript Rug event handler to a Rug project
editors.name: AddTypeScriptCommandHandler

parameters.name: handlerName
parameters.description: name of new event handler to add to Rug project
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Rug name starting with a capital letter and containing only alphanumeric characters, from one to 100 characters long

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: short description of event handler to add to Rug project
parameters.valid_input_description: free text

parameters.name: intent
parameters.description: Message the bot will associate with this command
parameters.valid_input_description: a phrase starting with a letter and containing only word characters and spaces

editors.description: adds a TypeScript Rug editor to a Rug project
editors.name: AddTypeScriptEditor

parameters.name: editorName
parameters.description: name of new editor to add to Rug project
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Rug name starting with a capital letter and containing only alphanumeric characters, from one to 100 characters long

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: short description of editor to add to Rug project
parameters.valid_input_description: free text

editors.description: adds a TypeScript Rug event handler to a Rug project
editors.name: AddTypeScriptEventHandler

parameters.name: handlerName
parameters.description: name of new event handler to add to Rug project
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Rug name starting with a capital letter and containing only alphanumeric characters, from one to 100 characters long

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: short description of event handler to add to Rug project
parameters.valid_input_description: free text

parameters.name: pathExpression
parameters.description: path expression to the event that will trigger this handler
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid path expression

editors.description: adds a TypeScript generator to a Rug project
editors.name: AddTypeScriptGenerator

parameters.name: generatorName
parameters.description: name of generator to add to Rug archive project
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Rug name starting with a capital letter and containing only alphanumeric characters, from one to 100 characters long

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: description of generator to add to Rug archive project
parameters.valid_input_description: free text

editors.description: converts and existing project to a Rug archive project with a basic Generator
editors.name: ConvertExistingProjectToGenerator

parameters.name: archiveName
parameters.description: name of your new Rug Archive, typically the same as the repo name
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid GitHub repo name containing only alphanumeric, ., -, and _ characters

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Maven group identifier, often used to provide a namespace for your rugs, e.g., company-rugs, typically the GitHub owner
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Maven group ID, which starts with a letter, -, or _ and contains only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters and may having leading period separated identifiers starting with letters or underscores and containing only alphanumeric and _ characters

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: initial version of the project, e.g., 1.2.3
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid semantic version, http://semver.org

parameters.name: generatorName
parameters.description: name of generator to add to Rug archive project
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid generator name starting with a capital letter and consisting of alphanumeric characters from one to 100 characters long

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: description of generator to add to Rug archive project
parameters.valid_input_description: a string between one and 100 characters

generators.description: creates a minimal Rug archive project with metadata and no Rugs
generators.name: NewRugProject

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: Name of your new project
parameters.valid_input_description: A valid GitHub repo name containing only alphanumeric, ., -, and _ characters and 21 characters or less to avoid Slack truncating the name when creating a channel for the repo

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Maven group identifier, often used to provide a namespace for your rugs, e.g., company-rugs, typically the GitHub owner
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid Maven group ID, which starts with a letter, -, or _ and contains only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters and may having leading period separated identifiers starting with letters or underscores and containing only alphanumeric and _ characters

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: short descriptive text describing the new project
parameters.valid_input_description: free text

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: initial version of the project, e.g., 1.2.3
parameters.valid_input_description: a valid semantic version, http://semver.org

generators.description: creates a new Rug archive project using standard setup, sensible defaults, and starter Rugs
generators.name: NewStarterRugProject

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: Name of your new project
parameters.valid_input_description: A valid GitHub repo name containing only alphanumeric, ., -, and _ characters and 21 characters or less to avoid Slack truncating the name when creating a channel for the repo
